pages.text: The $(d)Obsidian Skull$() has a chance of $(3)negating fire damage$() when held in the player's inventory.$(br2)The more damage that would have been taken, the higher the chance of negation. The exact formula is $(4)(amount^3)/100$().
pages.title: Obsidian Skull

pages.text: You can also craft the $(d)Obsidian Skull Ring$(), which can be worn in the Curio's ring slot!
pages.title: Obsidian Skull Ring
